<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/227764</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>227764</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier xmlns:lom="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
    <catalog>REPOSITORIOMEPT</catalog>
    <entry>2280</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description xmlns:lom="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>REPOSITORIOMEPT</catalog>
            <entry>2280</entry>
          </identifier>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <language>en</language>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Planets of the Solar System</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SCORM package on the planets of the solar system. It contains (a) a short activity in which students identify the various images of the planets of the solar system; (b) a PowerPoint presentation on the different planets and its main characteristics and (c) a quiz.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">planets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solar_system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SCORM</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">astronomy</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>REPOSITORIOMEPT</catalog>
            <entry>2280</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>pt</language>
          <contribute>
            <date>
              <dateTime>2010-04-19</dateTime>
            </date>
            <role>
              <source>LOMv1.0</source>
              <value>creator</value>
            </role>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <interactivityType>
            <source>interactivityTypeValues</source>
            <value>mixed</value>
          </interactivityType>
          <interactivityLevel>
            <source>interactivityLevelValues</source>
            <value>medium</value>
          </interactivityLevel>
          <semanticDensity>
            <source>semanticDensityValues</source>
            <value>low</value>
          </semanticDensity>
          <difficulty>
            <source>difficultyValues</source>
            <value>medium</value>
          </difficulty>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">12-13</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>assessment</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/2.5/pt/</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation xmlns:lom="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
    <identifier>
